original_title: UFC Fight Night 212: Grasso vs. Araújo
overview: UFC Fight Night 212: Grasso vs. Araújo was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on October 15, 2022, at the UFC Apex facility in Enterprise, Nevada, part of the Las Vegas Metropolitan Area, United States. A women's flyweight bout between Viviane Araújo and Alexa Grasso headlined this event.
title: UFC Fight Night 212: Grasso vs. Araújo
